items.title: Root questions need for pink-ball Ashes Test
items.description: Joe Root says he can understand why the Ashes features a pink-ball Test despite feeling like the England-Australia rivalry doesn't need one.

items.title: Ukraine hits tankers in Black Sea in escalation against Russia
items.description: The two ships struck by drones were thought to be used to bypass Western sanctions on Russia.

items.title: Four killed in shooting at child's birthday party in California
items.description: Police say 10 others are injured in what they believe is a "targeted" shooting, with children among the victims.

items.title: 'One of our greatest writers': King leads tributes to Sir Tom Stoppard
items.description: The King and Queen said they were "deeply saddened" by the loss of "a dear friend".

items.title: Venezuela condemns Trump's threat to close country's airspace
items.description: US President Donald Trump says airspace over Venezuela should be considered closed "in its entirety" as tensions mount between the two countries.
